TopicTitle: LOL! Awesome Polandball cartoon is awesome.

Articles.Content: A friend of mine showed me this in the middle of class and for some reason, I was crying with laughter. I think it was because of the sunglasses America is wearing. haha
The sad part is that the US is economically far more screwed than Poland.

The sad part is that the US is economically far more screwed than Poland.

if anything, Poland has THE most stable economy in Europe!

the only problem is oil, which they import from Russia

This ball is not Poland, at least when we look at the colors.

<- is how it should be.

Fail cartoon is fail ;P
Yeah, that\'s Indonesia. Or Monaco. Or Hesse. All of which also have better economies than the US, I might add.

This ball is not Poland, at least when we look at the colors.

<- is how it should be.

Fail cartoon is fail ;P

It\'s flipped upside down on purpose. I can\'t remember why, though.
It looks a lot like a Pokeball or the Voltorb pokemon. If you\'ll excuse me, I have to go out and buy some more dignity.

It\'s flipped upside down on purpose. I can\'t remember why, though.

Because it annoys Polish people.

When you\'re a nerd, you notice things.

Anyone notice how a white stripe is on top for the non-close-up versions of the US ball?

In the bottom-left-most square, there\'s a red stripe on top.

Yeah, that\'s Indonesia. Or Monaco. Or Hesse. All of which also have better economies than the US, I might add.

so Monaco cannot into space....better, poland WILL INTO SPACE
